Ino jumps into the air and manipulates countless flower petals to surround, confuse and blind her opponent. She then stomps them into the ground with a powerful kick.

== Trivia ==
* "Moonlight Beauty" is how the Japanese refer to [[Wikipedia:Epiphyllum oxypetalum|Epiphyllum oxypetalum]], known in English as "Queen of the Night".

[[es:Arte Ninja: Belleza Luz de la Luna]]
[[pl:Ninpō: Gekka Bijin]]
